GV05brupsb3u:318: yathā ca rūpadarśanārtha āloke sarvo 'pi tatrasthaḥ prakāśyata eva /
GV05brupsb3u:320: advaitārthatve vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vidyāsahitānām anyaspānuniṣpāditatve pramāṇānupapattiḥ
GV05brupsb3u:321: na pratyakṣaṃ nānumānamata eva ca nāgamaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:322: ubhayam ekena vākyena pradarśyata iti cet kulyāpraṇayanālokādivat /
GV05brupsb3u:328: mantrāḥ punaḥ kim asminnartha āhosvidanyasminnartha iti mṛgyametat /
GV05brupsb3u:329: tasmād grahātiprahalakṣaṇo mṛtyurbandhaḥ, tasmānbhokṣo vaktavya ityata
GV05brupsb3u:330: idamārabhyate na ca jānīmo viṣayasandhāvivāntarāle 'vasthānamardhajaratīyaṃ kauśalam /
GV05brupsb3u:333: nigaḍe hi nirjñāte nigaḍitasya mokṣāya yatnaḥ kartavyo
GV05brupsb3u:337: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- kati grahāḥ katy atigrahā iti |
GV05brupsb3u:339: ye te 'ṣṭau grahā aṣṭāv atigrahāḥ katame ta iti || BrhUp_3,2.1 ||
GV05brupsb3u:341: athānantaramaśvala uparate prakṛtaṃ yājñavalkyaṃ jaratkārugotro jāratkārava ṛtabhāgasyāpatyamārtabhāgaḥ papraccha yājñavalkyeti hovācetyabhimukhokaraṇāya /
GV05brupsb3u:344: tatra nirjñāteṣu vā grahātigraheṣu praśnaḥ syādanirjñāteṣu vā /
GV05brupsb3u:345: yadi tāvadgrahā atigrahāśca nirjñātāstadā tadgatasyāpi guṇasya saṃkhyāyā nijñātatvātkati grahāḥ katyatigrahā iti saṃkhyāviṣayaḥ praśno nopapadyate /
GV05brupsb3u:346: athanirjñātāstadā saṃkhyeyaviṣayapraśna iti ke grahāḥ ke 'tigrahā iti praṣṭavyaṃ na tu kati grahāḥ katyatigrahā iti praśnaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:347: api ca nirjñātasāmānyakeśu viśeṣavijñānāya praśno bhavati yathā katame 'tra kaṭhāḥ katame 'tra kālāpā iti /
GV05brupsb3u:348: na cātra grahātigrahā nāma padārthāḥ kecana loke prasiddhāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:350: nanu cātimucyata ityuktaṃ grahagṛhotasya hi mokṣaḥ sa muktiḥ sātimuktiriti hi dviruktam /
GV05brupsb3u:352: nanu tatrāpi catvāro grahā atigrahāśca nirjñātā vākcakṣuḥ prāṇamanāṃsi tatra katīti praśno nopapadyate nirjñātatvāt /
GV05brupsb3u:355: na hi catuṣṭvaṃ tatra vivakṣitamiha tu grahātigrahādarśane
GV05brupsb3u:357: tasmātsa muktiḥ sātimuktiriti muktyatiktī dvirukte grahātigrahā api siddhāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:358: ataḥ katisaṃkhyākā grahāḥ kati vātigrahā iti pṛcchati /
GV05brupsb3u:360: ye te 'ṣṭau grahā abhihitāḥ katame te niyamena grahītavyā iti //1//
GV05brupsb3u:366: prāṇo vai grahaḥ prāṇa iti ghrāṇamucyate /
GV05brupsb3u:371: apānopahṛtaṃ hi gandhaṃ ghrāṇena sarvo loko jighrati /
GV05brupsb3u:395: ity aṣṭau grahā aṣṭāv atigrahāḥ || BrhUp_3,2.9 ||
GV05brupsb3u:399: vāggrahaḥ sa nāmnātigrāreṇa gṛhītaḥ sa vāgākhyo graho nāmnā vaktavyena viṣayeṇātigraheṇa atigrāheṇeti daighyaṃ chāndasaṃ nāma vaktavyārthā hi vāktena vaktavyenārthena tādarthyena prayuktā vāktena vaśīkṛtā tena tatkāryamakṛtvā naiva tasyā mokṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:403: ityete tvakparyantā aṣṭau grahāḥ sparśaparyantāścaite 'ṣṭāvatigrahā iti //
GV05brupsb3u:405: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yad idaṃ sarvaṃ mṛtyor annaṃ kā svit sā devatā
GV05brupsb3u:409: BrhUpBh_3,2.10 upasaṃhṛteṣu grahātigraheṣvāha punaḥ - yājñavalkyeti hovāca /
GV05brupsb3u:410: yadidaṃ sarvaṃ mṛtyorannaṃ yadidaṃ vyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mṛtyorannaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate vipadyate ca grahātigrahalakṣaṇena mṛtyunā grastam /
GV05brupsb3u:411: kāsvitkā nu syātsā devatā yasyā devatāyā mṛtyurapyannaṃ bhavet /
GV05brupsb3u:417: sa yadi mṛtyorapi mṛtyuḥ syādbhavedgrahātigrahalakṣaṇasya mṛtyorvināśaḥ ato durvacanaṃ praśnaṃ manvānaḥ pṛcchati kāsvitsā devateti /
GV05brupsb3u:428: tasminbandhane nāśite mṛtyunā bhakṣite saṃsārānmokṣa upapanno bhavati /
GV05brupsb3u:429: bandhanaṃ hi grahātigrahalakṣaṇamuktaṃ tasmācca mokṣa upapadyata ityetatprasādhitam /
GV05brupsb3u:430: ato bandhamokṣāya puruṣaprayāsaḥ saphalo bhavatyato 'pajayati punarmṛtyum
GV05brupsb3u:432: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yatrāyaṃ puruṣo mriyata ud asmāt prāṇāḥ krāmanty āho neti |
GV05brupsb3u:438: BrhUpBh_3,2.11 pareṇa mṛtyunā mṛtyau bhakṣite paramātmadarśanena yo 'sau
GV05brupsb3u:439: mukto vidvānso 'yaṃ puruṣo yatra yasminkāle mriyata udūrdhvamasmādbrahmavido mriyamāṇātprāṇā vāgadayo grahā nāmādayaścātigrahā
GV05brupsb3u:442: gacchanti viduṣi kāryāṇi karaṇāni ca svayonau parabrahmasatattave samavanīyanta ekībhāvena samavasṛjyante pralīyanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:444: tathā ca śrutyantaraṃ kalāśabdavācyānāṃ prāṇānāṃ parasminnātmani pralayaṃ darśayati -"evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchantī"ti /
GV05brupsb3u:446: na tarhi mṛto, nahi, mṛtaścāyaṃ yasmātsa ucchvayatyucchūnatāṃ pratipadyata ādhmāyati bāhyena vāyunā pūryate dṛtivadādhmāto mṛtaḥ śete niśceṣṭaḥ
GV05brupsb3u:453: anantam eva sa tena lokaṃ jayati || BrhUp_3,2.12 ||
GV05brupsb3u:454: BrhUpBh_3,2.12 muktasya kiṃ prāṇā eva samavanoyanta āhosvittatprayojakamapi sarvam /
GV05brupsb3u:455: atha prāṇā eva na tatprayojakaṃ sarva, prayojake vidyamāne punaḥ prāṇānāṃ prasaṅgaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:456: atha sarvameva kāmakarmādi, tato mokṣa upapadyata ityevamartha uttaraḥ praśnaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:457: yājñavalkyeti hovāca yatrāyaṃ puruṣo mriyate kimenaṃ na jahātīti /
GV05brupsb3u:463: tadānantyādhikṛtā anantā bai viśve devā anantameva sa tena lokaṃ jayati /
GV05brupsb3u:467: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yatrāsya puruṣasya mṛtasyāgniṃ vāg apyeti vātaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:468: prāṇaś cakṣur ādityaṃ manaś candraṃ diśaḥ śrotraṃ pṛthivīṃ śarīram ākāśam ātmauṣadhīr lomāni vanaspatīn keśā apsu lohitaṃ ca retaś ca nidhīyate kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavatīti |
GV05brupsb3u:470: āvām evaitasya vediṣyāvo na nāv etat sajana iti |
GV05brupsb3u:472: tau ha yad ūcatuḥ karma haiva tad ūcatuḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:473: atha ha yat praśaṃsatuḥ karma haiva tat praśaśaṃsatuḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:474: puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpeneti |
GV05brupsb3u:475: tato ha jāratkārava ārtabhāga upararāma || BrhUp_3,2.13 ||
GV05brupsb3u:476: BrhUpBh_3,2.13 grahātigraharūpaṃ bandhanamuktaṃ mṛtyurūpaṃ tasya ca mṛtyormṛtyusadbhāvānmokṣaścopapadyate
GV05brupsb3u:477: sa ca mokṣo grahātigraharūpāṇāmihaiva pralayaḥ pradīpanirvāṇavat /
GV05brupsb3u:478: yadvadgrahātigrahākhyaṃ bandhanaṃ mṛtyurūpaṃ tasya yatprayojakaṃ tatsvarūpanirdhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate
GV05brupsb3u:480: atra kecidvarṇayanti grahātigrahasya saprayojakasya vināśe 'pi kila na mucyate /
GV05brupsb3u:482: paricchinno bhojyācca jagato vyāvṛtta ucchinna kāmakarmāntarāle vyavatiṣṭhate /
GV05brupsb3u:483: tasya paramātmaikatvadarśane dvaitadarśanamapanetavyamityataḥ paraṃ paramātmadarśanamārabdhavyamityevamapavargākhyāmantarālāvasthāṃ parikalyottaragranthasaṃbandhaṃ kurvanti /
GV05brupsb3u:484: tatra vaktavyaṃ viśīrṇeṣu karaṇeṣu videhasya paramātmadarśanaśravaṇamanananididhyāsanāni kathamiti
GV05brupsb3u:488: atha jīvannevāvidyāmātrāvaśiṣṭo bhojyādapāvṛtta iti parikalpyate tattu kiṃnimittamiti vaktavyam
GV05brupsb3u:490: karmasahitena dvaitaikatvātmadarśanena sampanno vidvānmṛtaḥ samavanītaprāṇo jagadātmatvaṃ hiraṇyagarbhasvarūpaṃ vā prāpnuyādasamavanītaprāṇo bhojyājjīvanneva vyāvṛtto viraktaḥ paramātmadarśanābhimukhaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb3u:495: atha mṛtvā hiraṇyagarbhaṃ prāpya tataḥ samavanītaprāṇo nāmāvaśiṣṭaḥ paramātmajñāne 'dhikriyate
GV05brupsb3u:497: sarveṣāṃ hi brahmavidyā puruṣārthāyopadiśyate"tadyo yo devānām"ityādyayā
GV05brupsb3u:502: bandhanamityetannirdidhārayiṣayā'ha-yatrāsya puruṣasyāsamyagdarśinaḥ śiraḥpāṇyādimato mṛtasya vāgagnimapyeti vātaṃ prāṇo 'pyeti
GV05brupsb3u:509: apsu lohitaṃ ca retaśca nidhīyata iti punarādānaliṅgam /
GV05brupsb3u:510: sarvatra hi vāgādiśabdena devatāḥ parigṛhyante na tu karaṇānyevāpakrāmanti prāṅmokṣāt /
GV05brupsb3u:511: tatra devatābhiranadhiṣṭhitāni karaṇāni nyastadātrādyupamānāni videhaśca kartā puruṣo 'svatantraḥ kimāśrito bhavatīti pṛcchayate-kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavatīti /
GV05brupsb3u:513: yamāśrayamāśritya punaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātamupādatte yena grahātigrahalakṣaṇaṃ bandhanaṃ prayujyate tatkimiti praśnaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:516: atra vastunirṇayaṃ cedicchasyāhara sobhya hastasārtabhāga ha āvāmevaitasya tvatpṛṣṭasya veditavyaṃ yattadvediṣyāvo nirūpayiṣyāvaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:518: na nāvāvayoretadvastu sajane janasamudāye nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb3u:521: tau yājñavalkyārtabhāgāvekāntaṃ gatvā kiṃ cakraturityucyate-tau hotkramya sajanāddeśānmantrayāñcakrāte
GV05brupsb3u:523: tau ha vicārya yadūcaturapohya pūrvapakṣānsarvāneva tacchṛṇu /
GV05brupsb3u:526: na kevalaṃ kālakarmadaiveśvareṣvabhyupagateṣu hetuṣu yatpraśaśaṃsatustau karma haiva tatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ
GV05brupsb3u:527: yasmānnirdhāritametatkarmaprayuktaṃ grahātigrahādikāryakaraṇopādānaṃ punaḥ punastasmātpuṇyo vai śāstravihitena puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati tadviparotena viparīto bhavati pāpaḥ pāpenetyevaṃ yājñavalkyena praśneṣu nirṇīteṣu tato
GV05brupsb3u:531: atha hainaṃ bhujyur lāhyāyaniḥ papraccha -- yājñavalkyeti hovāca --
GV05brupsb3u:538: athainam abrūma -- kva pārikṣitā abhavann iti |
GV05brupsb3u:544: yasmātsaprayojakānmukto mucyate yena vā baddhaḥ saṃsarati sa mṛtyuḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:549: tatra saṃsaratāṃ mucyamānānāṃ ca kāryakaraṇānāṃ svakāraṇasaṃsarge samāne muktānāmatyantameva punaranupādānam /
GV05brupsb3u:550: saṃsaratāṃ tu punaḥ punarupādānaṃ yena prayuktānāṃ bhavati tatkarmetyavadhāritaṃ vicāraṇāpūrvakam
GV05brupsb3u:553: puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpenetyavadhāritatvāt /
GV05brupsb3u:555: tatrāpuṇyena sthāvarajaṅgameṣu svabhāvaduḥkhabahuleṣu narakatiryakpretādiṣu ca duḥkhamanubhavati punaḥ punarjāyamāno mriyamāṇaścetyetadrājavartmavatsarvalokaprasiddham /
GV05brupsb3u:556: yattu śāstrīyaṃ puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati tatraivādaraḥ kriyata iha śrutyā /
GV05brupsb3u:557: puṇyameva ca karma sarvapuruṣārthasādhanamiti sarve śrutismṛtivādāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:561: sā nivartayitavyā jñānasahitasya ca prakṛṣṭasya karmaṇa etāvatī gatiḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:565: yatra ca vyāpāraḥ sa saṃsāra evetyasyārthasya pradarśanāya brahmaṇamārabhyate /
GV05brupsb3u:566: yattu kaiściducyate vidyāsahitaṃ karma nirabhisaṃdhi mantraśarkarādiyuktaviṣadadhyādivatkāryāntaramārabhata iti /
GV05brupsb3u:569: bandhanāśa eva hi mokṣo na kāryabhūtaḥ bandhanaṃ cāvidyetyavocāma /
GV05brupsb3u:573: utpādayituṃ prāpayituṃ vikartuṃ ca sāmarthyaṃ karmaṇo nāto vyatiriktaviṣayo 'sti karmasāmarthyasya
GV05brupsb3u:580: dṛṣṭaṃ hyanyaśaktitvena nirjñātānāmapi padārthānāṃ viṣadadhyādīnāṃ vidyāmantraśarkarādisaṃyuktānāmanyaviṣaye sāmathyam /
GV05brupsb3u:584: tatra hi karmaṇa uktaviṣayavyatirekeṇa viṣayāntare sāmarthyāstitve pramāṇaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ nānumānaṃ nopamānaṃ nārthāpattirna śabdo 'sti /
GV05brupsb3u:586: na hi nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ viśvajinnyāyena phalaṃ kalpyate /
GV05brupsb3u:591: nanu viśvajinnyāya evā'yāto mokṣasya phalasya kalpitatvāt /
GV05brupsb3u:592: mokṣe vānyasminvā phale 'kalpite puruṣā na pravarteranniti mokṣaḥ phalaṃ kalpyate śrutārthāpattyā yathā viśvajiti /
GV05brupsb3u:593: nanvevaṃ sati kathamucyate viśvajinnyāyo na bhavatīti /
GV05brupsb3u:594: phalaṃ ca kalpyate viśvajinnyāyaśca na bhavatīti vipratiṣiddhamabhidhīyate
GV05brupsb3u:598: karma kāryāntaraṃ viṣadadhyādivadārabhata iti hi pratijñātam /
GV05brupsb3u:599: sa cenmokṣaḥ karmaṇaḥ kāryaṃ phalameva na bhavatīti sā pratijñā hīyeta /
GV05brupsb3u:600: karmakāryatve ca mokṣasya svargādiphalebhyo viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:601: atha karmakāryaṃ na bhavati nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ mokṣa ityasyā vacanavyakteḥ kor'tha iti vaktavyam /
GV05brupsb3u:602: na ca kāryaphalaśabdabhedamātreṇa viśeṣaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum /
GV05brupsb3u:603: aphalaṃ ca mokṣo nityaiśca karmabhiḥ kriyate nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ na kāryamiti caiṣor'tho vipratiṣiddho 'bhidhīyate yathāgniḥ śīta iti /
GV05brupsb3u:611: na cājñānavyatirekeṇa mokṣasya vyavadhānāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam /
GV05brupsb3u:617: karma tu tājñānena virudhyate tena jñānavilakṣaṇaṃ karma /
GV05brupsb3u:618: yadi jñānābhāvo yadi saṃśayajñānaṃ yadi viparītajñānaṃ vocyate 'jñānamiti
GV05brupsb3u:624: yathāvaghātena vrīhīṇāṃ tuṣanivṛttau gamyamānāyāmagnihotrādinityakarmakāryādṛṣṭā na kalpyate tuṣanivṛttiḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:629: kiñcānyatkalpye ca phale nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ śrutānāṃ yatkarmabhirvirudhyate dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ kāryameva na bhavati, kiṃ tatkalpyatāmiti?
GV05brupsb3u:630: yasminkarmaṇaḥ sāmarthyameva na dṛṣṭam, kiṃvā yasmindṛṣṭaṃ sāmarthyaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:632: puruṣapravṛttijananāyāvaśyaṃ cetkarmaphalaṃ kalpayitavyam karmāviruddhaviṣaya eva śrutārthāpatteḥ kṣīṇatvānnityo mokṣaḥ phalaṃ kalpayituṃ na śakyastadvyavadhānājñānanivṛttirvā /
GV05brupsb3u:635: sarveṣāṃ hi karmaṇāṃ sarvaṃ phalam na cānyaditarakarmaphalavyatirekeṇa phalaṃ kalpanāyogyamasti
GV05brupsb3u:641: nahi puruṣecchāviṣayāṇāṃ karmaphalānāmetāvattvaṃ nāma kenacidasarvajñenāvadhṛtaṃ tatsādhanānāṃ vā puruṣecchānāṃ vāniyatadeśakālanimittatvātpuruṣecchāviṣayasādhanānāṃ ca puruṣeṣṭaphalaprayuktatvāt pratiprāṇi cecchāvaicitryātphalānāṃ tatsādhanānāṃ cā'nantyasiddhiḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:643: ajñāte ca sādhanaphalaitāvattve kathaṃ mokṣasya pariśeṣasiddhiriti /
GV05brupsb3u:645: satyapīcchāviṣayāṇāṃ tatsādhanānāṃ cā'nantye karmaphalajātitvaṃ nāma sarveṣāṃ tulyam /
GV05brupsb3u:651: utpattayāptivikārasaṃskārāṇāmanyatamapi nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalamupapadyata iti kṣīṇā śrutārthāpattiḥ
GV05brupsb3u:657: na ca saṃskriyamāṇaḥ saṃskāranirvartyo vā yūpādivat /
GV05brupsb3u:660: itaraiḥ karmabhirvailakṣaṇyānnityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tatphalenāpi vilakṣaṇena bhavitavyamiti cet
GV05brupsb3u:666: yathā hi gṛhadāhādau nimitte kṣāmavatyādīṣṭiryathā bhinne juhoti skanne juhotītyevamādau naimittikeṣu karmasu na mokṣaḥ phalaṃ kalpyate /
GV05brupsb3u:669: ālokasya sarveṣāṃ rūpadarśanasādhanatva ulūkādaya ālokena rūpaṃ na paśyantītyulukādicakṣuṣo vailakṣaṇyāditaralokacakṣurbhirna rasādiviṣayatvaṃ parikalpyate rasādiviṣaye sāmarthyasyādṛṣṭatvāt sudūramapi gatvā yadviṣaye dṛṣṭaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tatraiva kaścidviśeṣaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:672: nirabhisaṃdheḥ karmaṇo vidyāsaṃyuktasya viśiṣṭakāryāntarārambhe na kaścidvirodhaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:681: tathā gārbhairhemairityādiprakaraṇe kāryakaraṇasaṃskārārthatvaṃ nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ darśayati
GV05brupsb3u:682: saṃskṛtaśca ya ātmayājī taiḥ karmabhiḥ samaṃ draṣṭuṃ samartho bhavati /
GV05brupsb3u:683: tasyeha vā janmāntare vā samamātmadarśanamutpadyate samaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:687: kiñcānyat- brahmā viśvasṛjo dharmo mahānavyaktameva ca /
GV05brupsb3u:689: iti ca devasārṣṭivyatirekeṇa bhūtāpyayaṃ darśayati bhūtānyapyeti pañca vai /
GV05brupsb3u:690: bhūtānyatyetīti pāṭhaṃ ye kurvanti teṣāṃ vedaviṣaye paricchinnabuddhitvādadoṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:691: na cārthavādatvamadhyāyasya brahmāntakarmavipākārthasya tadvayatiriktātmajñānārthasya ca karmakāṇḍopaniṣadbhayāṃ tulyārthatvadarśanāt /
GV05brupsb3u:694: na ca śrutismṛtivīrītapratiṣiddhavyatirekeṇa vihitāni vā pratiṣiddhānivā karmāṇi kenacidavagantuṃ śakyante /
GV05brupsb3u:697: tasmādvihitākaraṇapratiṣiddhasevānāṃ yathaite karmavipākāḥ pretatiryaksthāvarādayastathotkṛṣṭeṣvapi brahmānteṣu karmavipākatvaṃ veditavyam /
GV05brupsb3u:703: na ca"brahmā viśvasṛja"ityādīnāṃ kāmyakarmaphalatvaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum /
GV05brupsb3u:705: tasmātsābhisaṃdhīnāṃ nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ sarvamedhāśvamedhādīnāṃ ca brahmatvādīni phalāni /
GV05brupsb3u:706: yeṣāṃ punarnityāni nirabhisaṃdhīnyātmasaṃskārārthāni teṣāṃ jñānotpattyarthāni tāni /
GV05brupsb3u:713: na ca pramāṇāntaraviruddhārthaviṣaye śruteḥ prāmāṇyaṃ kalpyate yathā śīto 'gniḥ kledayatīti
GV05brupsb3u:723: athānantaram uparate jāratkārave, bhujyuriti nāmato lahyasyāpatyaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:727: jñānasamuccito vā kevalajñānasampādito vā, sarvakarmaṇāṃ parā kāṣṭhā;bhraṇahatyāśvamedhābhyāṃ na paraṃ puṇyapāpayoriti hi smaranti;tena
GV05brupsb3u:728: hi samaṣṭiṃ vyaṣṭīśca prāpnoti;tatra vyaṣṭayo nirjñātā antaraṇḍaviṣayā
GV05brupsb3u:731: mṛtyuścāśanāyālakṣaṇo buddhayātmā samaṣṭiḥ prathamajo vāyuḥ sūtraṃ satyaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:733: yaḥ sarvabhūtāntarātmā liṅgam amūrtaraso yadāśritāni sarvabhūtakarmāṇi,
GV05brupsb3u:734: yaḥ karmaṇāṃ karmasambaddhānāṃ ca vijñānānāṃ parā gatiḥ paraṃ phalam,
GV05brupsb3u:735: tasya kiyān gocaraḥ kiyati vyāptiḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalībhūtā, sā
GV05brupsb3u:736: vaktavyā;tasyām uktāyāṃ sarvaḥ saṃsāro bandhagocara ukto bhavati /
GV05brupsb3u:737: tasya ca samaṣṭivyaṣṭyātmadarśanasya alaukikatvapradarśanārthamākhyāyikāmātmano vṛttāṃ prakurute;tena ca prativādibuddhiṃvyāmohayiṣyāmīti manyate /
GV05brupsb3u:738: madreṣu madrā nāma janapadāsteṣu, carakā adhyayanārthavratacaraṇāccarakā adhvaryavo vā, paryavrajāma paryaṭitavantaḥ;te patañcalasya nāmataḥ,
GV05brupsb3u:740: tasyāsīd duhitā gandharvagṛhītā-gandharveṇa amānuṣeṇa sacvena kenacidāviṣṭā;gandharvo vā dhiṣṇyo 'gnirṛtvigadevatā
GV05brupsb3u:742: taṃ sarve vayaṃ parivāritāḥ santo 'pṛcchāma-ko 'sīti, kastvamasi kinnāmā kiṃsatacvaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:743: so 'bravīd gandharvaḥ sudhanvā nāmataḥ, āṅgiraso gotrataḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:744: taṃ yadā yasmin kāle lokānāmantān paryavasānāni apṛcchāma athainaṃ gandharvamabrūma-bhūvanakośaparimāṇajñānāya pravṛtteṣu sarveṣvātmānaṃ ślāghayantaḥ pṛṣṭavanto vayam;katham? kva pārikṣitā abhavanniti sa ca gandharvaḥ sarvamasmabhyabravīt /
GV05brupsb3u:745: tena divyebhyo mayā labdhaṃ jñānam, tattava nāsti, ato nigṛhīto 'si,
GV05brupsb3u:747: so 'haṃ vidyāsampanno labdhāgamo gandharvāt tvā tvāṃ pṛcchāmi
GV05brupsb3u:748: yājñavalkya-kva pārikṣitā abhavantat tvaṃ kiṃ jānāsi? he
GV05brupsb3u:752: agacchan vai te tad yatrāśvamedhayājino gacchantīti |
GV05brupsb3u:756: tāṃ samantaṃ pṛthivīṃ dvistāvat samudraḥ paryeti |
GV05brupsb3u:757: tad yāvatī kṣurasya dhārā yāvad vā makṣikāyāḥ pattraṃ tāvān antareṇākāśaḥ tān aindraḥ suparṇo bhūtvā vāyave prāyacchat |
GV05brupsb3u:758: tān vāyur ātmani dhitvā tatrāgamayad yatrāśvamedhayājino 'bhavann iti |
GV05brupsb3u:759: evam iva vai sa vāyum eva praśaśaṃsa tasmād vāyur eva vyaṣṭir vāyuḥ samaṣṭiḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:760: apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brupsb3u:761: tato ha bhujyur lāhyāyanir upararāma || BrhUp_3,3.2 ||
GV05brupsb3u:762: BrhUpBh_3,3.2 sa hovāca yājñavalkya uvāca vai saḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:765: agacchanvai te pārikṣitāstattatra kva? yatra yasminnaśvamedhayājino gacchantīti /
GV05brupsb3u:766: nirṇote praśna āha-kva nu kasminnaśvamedhayājino gacchantīti /
GV05brupsb3u:767: teṣāṃ gativivakṣayā bhuvanakośaparimāṇamāha-dvātriṃśataṃ vai dve adhike
GV05brupsb3u:768: triṃśaddvātriṃśataṃ vai devarathāhrayāni deva ādityastasya ratho devarathastasya rathasya gatyāhrā yāvatparicchidyate deśaparimāṇa taddevarathāhrayaṃ taddvātriṃśadguṇitaṃ devarathāhrayāni tāvatparimāṇo
GV05brupsb3u:770: yatra vairājaṃ śarīraṃ yatra ca karmaphalopabhogaḥ prāṇināṃ sa eṣa loka etāvāṃlloko 'taḥ paramalokastaṃ lokaṃ samantaṃ samantato lokavistārāddviguṇaparimāṇavistāreṇa parimāṇena taṃ lokaṃ parikṣiptā
GV05brupsb3u:772: tāṃ pṛthivīṃ tathaiva samantaṃ dvistāvaddviguṇena parimāṇena samudraḥ paryeti yaṃ ghanodamācakṣate paurāṇikāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:775: tatra yāvatī yāvatparimāṇa kṣurasya dhārāgraṃ yāvadvā saukṣmyeṇa yuktaṃ makṣikāyāḥ patraṃ tāvāṃstāvatparimāṇo 'ntareṇa madhye
GV05brupsb3u:778: 'gniścitaḥ suparṇo yadviṣayaṃ darśanamuktaṃ tasya prāci diviśara ityādinā suparṇaḥ pakṣī bhūtvā pakṣapucchādyātmakaḥ suparṇo bhūtvā vāyave prāyacchanmūrtatvānnāstyātmano gatistatreti tānpārikṣitānvāyurātmani dhitvā sthāpayitvā svātmabhūtānkṛtvā tatra tasminnagamayat /
GV05brupsb3u:781: evamiva vā evameva sa gandharvo vāyumeva praśaśaṃsa pārikṣitānāṃ gatim /
GV05brupsb3u:785: yasmādvāyuḥ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā bahiśca sa eva tasmādadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivabhāvena vividhā yāṣṭirvyāptiḥ sa vāyureva /
GV05brupsb3u:787: evaṃ vāyumātmānaṃ samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpātmakatvenopagacchati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brupsb3u:788: tasya kiṃ phalamityāhi-apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sakṛtmṛtvā punanaṃ mriyate /
GV05brupsb3u:793: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti
GV05brupsb3u:795: yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:797: yo vyānena vyaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:798: ya udānenodaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:802: puṇyasya ca para utkarṣo vyākhyāto vyākṛtaviṣayaḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpo dvaitaikatvātmaprāptiḥ
GV05brupsb3u:803: yastu grahātigrahairgrastaḥ saṃsarati so 'sti vā nāstyastitve ca
GV05brupsb3u:807: atha hainaṃ prakṛtaṃ yājñavalkyamuṣasto nāmataścakrasyāpatyaṃ cākrāyaṇaḥ papraccha /
GV05brupsb3u:814: sarvasyābhyantaraḥ sarvāntaraḥ yadyaḥśabdābhyāṃ prasiddha ātmā brahmeti /
GV05brupsb3u:816: viṣpaṣṭaṃ śṛṅge gṛhītvā yathā gāṃ darśayati tathā'cakṣva so 'yamityevaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:818: evamuktaḥ pratyāha yājñavalkyaḥ-eṣu te tavā'tmā sarvāntaraḥ sarvasyābhyantaraḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:820: yatsākṣādavyavahitamaparokṣādagauṇaṃ brahma bṛhattamamātmā sarvasyābhyantara etairguṇaiḥ samastairukta eṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:824: tatra piṇḍastamyābhyantare liṅgātmā karaṇasaṃghātastṛtīyo yaśca saṃdihyamānasteṣu katamo mamā'tmā sarvāntarastvayā vivakṣita ityukta itara
GV05brupsb3u:825: āha-yaḥ prāṇena mukhanāsikāsaṃcāriṇā prāṇiti prāṇaceṣṭāṃ karoti yena
GV05brupsb3u:831: sarvāḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātagatāḥ prāṇanādiceṣṭā dāruyantrasyeva yena kriyante /
GV05brupsb3u:836: sa hovācoṣastaś cākrāyaṇaḥ -- yathā vai brūyād asau gaur asāv aśva ity evam evaitad vyapadiṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GV05brupsb3u:837: yad eva sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti |
GV05brupsb3u:847: BrhUpBh_3,4.2 sa hovācoṣastaścākrāyaṇo yathā kaścidanyathā pratijñāya pūrvaṃ punarvipratipanno brūyādanyathāsau gaurasāvaśvo yaścalati dhāvatīti
GV05brupsb3u:848: vā pūrvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayāmiti pratijñāya paścāccalanādiliṅgairvyapadiśatyevamevaitadbrahma prāṇanādiliṅgairvyapadiṣṭaṃ bhavati tvayā /
GV05brupsb3u:849: kiṃ bahunā tyaktvā gotṛṣṇānimittaṃ vyājaṃ yadeva sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastaṃ me vyācakṣveti /
GV05brupsb3u:850: itara āha-yathā mayā prathamaṃ pratijñātastavā'tmava (tmā vi) lakṣaṇa iti tāṃ pratijñāmanuvarta eva /
GV05brupsb3u:859: dṛṣṭiriti dvividhā bhavati laukikī pāramārthikī ceti /
GV05brupsb3u:861: sā kriyata iti jāyate vinaśyati ca /
GV05brupsb3u:862: yā tvātmano dṛṣṭiragnyuṣṇaprakāśādivatsā ca draṣṭaḥ svarūpatvānna jāyate na vinaśyati ca /
GV05brupsb3u:863: sā kriyamāṇayopādhibhūtayā saṃsṛṣṭeveti vyapadiśyate draṣṭeti bhedavacca draṣṭā dṛṣṭiriti ca /
GV05brupsb3u:864: yāsau laukikī dṛṣṭiścakṣurdvārā rūpoparaktā jāyamānaiva nityayā'tmadṛṣṭyā
GV05brupsb3u:865: saṃsṛṣṭeva tatpraticchāyā tayā vyāptaiva jāyate tathā vinaśyati ca tenopacaryate draṣṭā sadā paśyannapi paśyati na paśyati ceti /
GV05brupsb3u:869: tamimamarthamāha-laukikyā dṛṣṭeḥ karmabhūtāyā draṣṭāraṃ svakīyayā nityayā dṛṣṭyā vyāptāraṃ na paśyeḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:870: yāsau laukikī dṛṣṭiḥ karmabhūtā sā rūpoparaktā rūpābhivyañjikā nā'tmānaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:874: tathā matermanovṛtteḥ kevalāyā vyāptāraṃ na manvīthāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:875: tathā vijñāteḥ kevalāyā buddhivṛttervyāptāraṃ na vijānīyāḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:876: eṣa vastunaḥ svabhāvo 'to naiva darśayituṃ śakyate gavādivat /
GV05brupsb3u:878: na dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāraṃ dṛṣṭeḥ kartāraṃ dṛṣṭibhedamakṛtvā dṛṣṭimātrasya kartāraṃ na paśyeriti /
GV05brupsb3u:883: tatra dṛṣṭeriti ṣaṣṭhyantena dṛṣṭigrahaṇaṃ nirarthakamiti doṣaṃ na paśyanti paśyatāṃ vā punaruktamasāraḥ pramādapāṭha iti vā nā'daraḥ /
GV05brupsb3u:884: kathaṃ punarādhikyaṃ tṛjantenaiva dṛṣṭikartṛtvasya siddhatvāddṛṣṭeriti nirarthakam /
GV05brupsb3u:887: gantāraṃ bhattāraṃ vā nayatītyetāvāneva hi śabdaḥ prayujyate /
GV05brupsb3u:892: tasmādvyākhyātṛṇāmeva buddhidaurbalyaṃ nādhyetṛpramādaḥ yathā tvasmābhirvyākhyātaṃ laukikadṛṣṭervivicya nityadṛṣṭiviśiṣṭa ātmā pradarśayitavyastathā kartṛkarmaviśeṣaṇatvena dṛṣṭiśabdasya dviḥprayoga upapadyata ātmasvarūpanirdhāraṇāya /
GV05brupsb3u:897: evameva hyātmano nityatvamupapadyate vikriyābhāve vikriyāvacca nityamiti ca vipratiṣiddham
GV05brupsb3u:898: "dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva" "nahi draṣṭurdṛṣṭerviparilopo vidyate" "eṣa nityo mahimā brāhmaṇasya"iti ca śrutyakṣarāṇyanyathā na gacchanti /
GV05brupsb3u:899: nanu draṣṭā śrotā mantā vijñātetyevamādīnyapyakṣarāṇyātmano 'vikriyatve na gacchantīti /
GV05brupsb3u:904: tasmādanavabodhādeva hi viśeṣaṇaṃ parityaktaṃ dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramityevamādīnāmanyārthāsambhavādyathoktārthaparatvamavagamyate tasmādanavabodhādeva hi viśeṣaṇaṃ parityaktaṃ dṛṣṭeriti /
GV05brupsb3u:906: ata etasmādātmano 'nyadārta kārya vā śarīraṃ karaṇātmakaṃ vā liṅgam /
GV05brupsb3u:911: atha hainaṃ kaholaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraccha -- yājñavalkyeti hovāca |
GV05brupsb3u:912: yad eva sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti |
GV05brupsb3u:915: yo 'śanāyāpipāse śokaṃ mohaṃ jarāṃ mṛtyum atyeti |
GV05brupsb3u:916: etaṃ vai tam ātmānaṃ viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putraiṣaṇāyāś ca vittaiṣaṇāyāś ca lokaiṣaṇāyāś ca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti |
GV05brupsb3u:917: yā hy eva putraiṣaṇā sā vittaiṣaṇā yā vittaiṣaṇā sā lokaiṣaṇā |
GV05brupsb3u:918: ubhe hy ete eṣaṇe eva bhavataḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:919: tasmād brāmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāset |
GV05brupsb3u:920: bālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:921: amaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ |
GV05brupsb3u:922: sa brāhmaṇaḥ kena syād yena syāt tenedṛśa eva |
GV05brupsb3u:924: tato ha kaholaḥ kauṣītakeya upararāma || BrhUp_3,5.1 ||
GV05brupsb3u:927: tasyedānīṃ bandhamokṣasādhanaṃ sasaṃnyāsamātmajñānaṃ vaktavyamiti kaholapraśna ārabhyate-atha hainaṃ kaholo nāmataḥ kuṣītakasyāpatyaṃ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraccha yājñavalkyeti hovāceti pūrvavat yadeva sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastaṃ me vyācakṣveti /
GV05brupsb3u:930: kimuṣastakaholābhyāmeka ātmā pṛṣṭaḥ kiṃvā bhinnāvātmānau tulyalakṣaṇāviti
GV05brupsb3u:932: yadi hyeka ātmoṣastakaholapraśnayorvivakṣitastatraikenaiva praśnenādhigatatvāttadviṣayo dvitoyaḥ praśno 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb3u:937: eṣa ta ātmeti hi prativacane pratijñātam /
GV05brupsb3u:940: na coṣastasyānyaḥ kaholasyānyo jātito bhinna ātmā bhavati /
GV05brupsb3u:942: yadyekamagauṇaṃ brahma dvayoritareṇavaśyaṃ gauṇena bhavitavyaṃ tathā'tmatvaṃ sarvāntaratvaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb3u:944: yadyekaṃ sarvāntaraṃ brahmā'tmā mukhya itareṇāsarvāntareṇānātmanāmukhyenāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam

GV05brupsb3u:948: ucyate-pūrvasminpraśne 'sti vyatirikta ātmā yasyāyaṃ saprayojako bandha ukta iti /
GV05brupsb3u:957: yathā rajjuśuktikāgaganādayaḥ sarparajatamalinā bhavanti parādhyāropitadharmaviśiṣṭāḥ svataḥ kevalā eva rajjuśuktikāgaganādayaḥ /

GV05brupsb3u:962: yadā tu paramārthadṛṣṭyā paramātmatattvācchratyanusāribhiranyatvena nirupyamāṇe nāmarūpe mṛdādivikāravadvastvantare tattvato na staḥ salilaphenaghaṭādivikāravadeva tadā tadapekṣya'ekamevādvitīyaṃ'neha
GV05brupsb3u:964: yadā tu svābhāvikyāvidyayā brahmasvarūpaṃ rajjuśuktikāgaganasvarūpavadeva svena rūpeṇa vartamānaṃ kenacidaspṛṣṭasvabhāvamapi sannāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇopādhibhyo vivekena nāvadhāyate nāmarūpopādhidṛṣṭireva ca bhavati svābhāvikī tadā sarvo 'yaṃ
GV05brupsb3u:966: asti cāyaṃ bhedakṛto mithyāvyavahāro yeṣāṃ brahmatattvādanyatvena vastu vidyate yeṣāṃ ca nāsti
GV05brupsb3u:967: paramārthavādibhistu śrutyanusāreṇa nirūpyamāṇe vastuni kiṃ tattvato 'sti
GV05brupsb3u:968: vastu kiṃvā nāstīti brahmaikamevādvitīyaṃ sarvasaṃvyahāraśūnyamiti nirdhāryate tena na kaścidvirodhaḥ

GV05brupsb3u:1249: tatraitat syāt pṛthivīdevataiva antaryāmītyata āha - yamantaryāmiṇaṃ pṛthivī devatāpi na veda mayyanyaḥ kaścidvartata iti /

GV05brupsb3u:1265: yo vāyau tiṣṭhan vāyor antaro yaṃ vāyur na veda yasya vāyuḥ śarīraṃ yo vāyum antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ || BrhUp_3,7.7 ||

GV05brupsb3u:1270: yaś candratārake tiṣṭhañ candratārakād antaro yaṃ candratārakaṃ na veda yasya candratārakaṃ śarīraṃ yaś candratārakam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ || BrhUp_3,7.11 ||

GV05brupsb3u:1273: yas tejasi tiṣṭhaṃs tejaso 'ntaro yaṃ tejo na veda yasya tejaḥ śarīraṃ yas tejo 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ || BrhUp_3,7.14 ||

GV05brupsb3u:1335: loke kāśyaḥ kāśiṣu bhavaḥ kāśyaḥ, prasiddhaṃ śauryaṃ kāśye, vaideho vā videhānāṃ vā rājā, ugraputraḥ śūrānvaya ityarthaḥ, ujjyam avatāritajyākaṃ dhanuḥ punaradhijyam āropitalyākaṃ kṛtvā dvau bāṇavantau bāṇaśabdena śarāgre yo vaṃśakhaṇḍaḥ saṃdhīyate, tena vināpi śaro bhavatītyato viśinaṣṭi bāṇavantāviti - dvau bāṇavantau śarau, tayoreva viśeṣaṇaṃ sapatnātivyādhinau śatroḥ pīḍākarāvatiśayena, haste kṛtvopottiṣṭhet samīpata ātmānaṃ darśayet evamevāhaṃ tvā tvāṃ śarasthānīyābhyāṃ praśnābhyāṃ dvābhyāmupodasthāṃ utthitavatyasmi tvatsamīpe /
